statements: SELECT * FROM order_processing_tasks;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_status FROM order_processing_tasks;
SELECT order_description, order_status FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM order_processing_tasks ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_description FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_description, customer_name FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_description, customer_name FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' AND order_status = 'Processing';
SELECT * FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND (order_status = 'Pending' OR order_status = 'Processing') ORDER BY order_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, order_details, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT order_id, order_details FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_details FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_email IN ('john.doe@example.com', 'jane.smith@example.com') ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id HAVING total_orders >= 5;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND order_details ILIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM Orders o JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN Products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderDetails GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 5;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.customer_name, Products.product_name FROM Orders INNER JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id INNER JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.product_name, quantity FROM Order_Items JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 5;
SELECT order_id, status FROM fulfillment_status WHERE status = 'shipped';
